questions.question: The author implies that Durverger's actual findings are-

options.label: খ
options.text: inaccurate in their description of the four countries in the early 1950s

options.label: গ
options.text: out-of-date in that they are inapplicable in the four countries today

questions.option_b: inaccurate in their description of the four countries in the early 1950s
questions.option_c: out-of-date in that they are inapplicable in the four countries today

questions.question: Which of the following characteristics of a country is most clerly an example of a factor that Duverger, as described in the passage, failed to consider is his study?
The passge implies, that, in comparing four european countries, Duverger found that the voting rates of women and men were most different in the country in which women-

options.label: গ
options.text: had possessed the right to vote for the shortest time

options.label: ঘ
options.text: had the most egalitarian, relations with men

questions.option_d: had the most egalitarian, relations with men

questions.question: The ____ prediction of greatly decreased revenue next year has frightened law makers into __ budger reduction
questions.explanation: alarming & negligible হলে sentence টি অর্থ পূর্ণ হয়

questions.question: Your ___ remarks spoil the effect of your speech; try not to stray from your subject.
questions.explanation: ক) digressive হলো সঠিক উত্তর। Sentence টি হবে: "Your digressive remarks spoil the effect of your speech; try not to stray from your subject." Digressive মানে হলো মূল বিষয় থেকে সরে যাওয়া বা অপ্রাসঙ্গিক কথা বলা (straying from the main topic)। এই sentence-এ এটাই সবচেয়ে ভালো fit করে, কারণ এখানে বলা হচ্ছে যে অপ্রাসঙ্গিক কথা (digressive remarks) speech-এর effect নষ্ট করে দিচ্ছে। অন্য options গুলো কেন সঠিক নয়: খ) enigmatic : এর মানে হলো রহস্যময় বা বোঝা কঠিন (mysterious or hard to understand)। এটি এই context-এ fit করে না। গ) persistent : এর মানে হলো জেদি বা অবিরাম (continuing firmly)। এটি এই sentence-এর সাথে মেলে না। ঘ) derogatory : এর মানে হলো অসম্মানজনক বা নিন্দামূলক (disrespectful or critical)। এটি অপ্রাসঙ্গিক কথা বলার সাথে সম্পর্কিত নয়।

questions.explanation: বাক্যটি past perfect এ করতে হবে

questions.tag: RU A 14-15 SET B ODD,DU B 22-23,DU C 09-10,JU E 16-17 Set-2
questions.question: Find the correct sentence-

options.label: ক
options.text: How long have you been here for?

options.label: খ
options.text: I have known him for the beginning of the year.

options.label: গ
options.text: They have known each other since six months.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: This is the worst tsunami since ten years.

questions.option_a: How long have you been here for?
questions.option_b: I have known him for the beginning of the year.
questions.option_c: They have known each other since six months.
questions.option_d: This is the worst tsunami since ten years.
questions.explanation: অপশন ভুল বাক্য সঠিক রূপ (Correction) কারণ খ I have known him for the beginning of the year. I have known him since the beginning of the year. 'Beginning' একটি নির্দিষ্ট বিন্দু, তাই since বসবে। গ They have known each other since six months. They have known each other for six months. 'Six months' একটি সময়ের ব্যাপ্তি, তাই for বসবে। ঘ This is the worst tsunami since ten years. This is the worst tsunami in/for ten years. 'Ten years' সময়ের পরিমাণ বোঝাচ্ছে, তাই since হবে না।

options.label: ক
options.text: Your are not working hard so your success is out of a question

options.label: খ
options.text: Your are not working hard so your success is out of the question

options.label: গ
options.text: Your are not working hard so your success is out of question

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Your are not working hard so your success is out not the question

questions.option_a: Your are not working hard so your success is out of a question
questions.option_b: Your are not working hard so your success is out of the question
questions.option_c: Your are not working hard so your success is out of question
questions.option_d: Your are not working hard so your success is out not the question
questions.explanation: সঠিক বাক্যটি হলো: "Your are not working hard so your success is out of the question"। এখানে "out of the question" একটি সঠিক বাগধারা, যার অর্থ অসম্ভব।

questions.question: Select the correctly punctuated sentence.

options.label: ক
options.text: That tall man, Pauls granddad, is this month's winner.

options.label: খ
options.text: That tall man, Paul's granddad, is this month winner

options.label: গ
options.text: That tall man Paul's granddad, is this month's winner.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: That tall man, Paul's granddad, is this month's winner.

questions.option_a: That tall man, Pauls granddad, is this month's winner.
questions.option_b: That tall man, Paul's granddad, is this month winner
questions.option_c: That tall man Paul's granddad, is this month's winner.
questions.option_d: That tall man, Paul's granddad, is this month's winner.
questions.explanation: Apostrophe দ্বারা সাধারণত অধিকার বুঝায়, (Pai) grandad = grandad of Paul; month's winner-winner of the mont Punctuation (comma) ও সঠিক ভাবে ব্যবহার করা হয়েছে D তে।

questions.question: My uncle sees me every now and again. Here ‘ every now and Again ‘ means —-
questions.explanation: now and again মাঝে মাঝে, occasionally। Frequently - ঘন ঘন। Occasionally - কদাচিৎ/ মাঝে মাঝে। Rarely - কদাচিৎ। Daily - দৈনিক। সবচেয়ে কাছাকাছি, Occasionally…

questions.question: At one's fingertips' means
questions.explanation: at one's fingertips সম্পূর্ণ জ্ঞান complete knowledge

questions.question: The new economic policy is likely to run into rough weather.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: গ) encounter difficulties Idiom টা হলো: "run into rough weather" এর মানে হলো সমস্যার সম্মুখীন হওয়া বা কঠিন পরিস্থিতির মুখোমুখি হওয়া (to encounter difficulties or face problems)। তাই, correct meaning টা হলো: "The new economic policy is likely to encounter difficulties." (নতুন অর্থনৈতিক নীতি সম্ভবত সমস্যার সম্মুখীন হবে।) Other options: Option ক) "makes things difficult" - এটা partially correct, কিন্তু idiom-এর exact meaning না। Option খ) "create problems" - এটা partially correct, কিন্তু idiom-এর exact meaning না। Option ঘ) "confuse matters" - এটা idiom-এর meaning না। So, the correct answer is option গ।

questions.question: Rakib would certainly have attended the proceedings

options.label: ক
options.text: if he didn't get a flat tire

options.label: খ
options.text: if the flat tire hadn't happened

options.label: গ
options.text: if he had not a flat tire

questions.option_a: if he didn't get a flat tire
questions.option_b: if the flat tire hadn't happened
questions.option_c: if he had not a flat tire
questions.explanation: এখানে নিয়ম অনুযায়ী past perfect tense হওয়া উচিত। কারণ, ….would have + V3, থাকলে if যুক্ত clause past perfect tense এ হবে। এখন দেখা যাক অপশন গুলো কি নির্দেশ করে… (ক)If + Past indefinite tense (খ) If + Past indefinite tense (গ)If + Past indefinite tense (ঘ) যেহেতু কোনোটাই সঠিক নয়, তাই অপশন (ঘ) সঠিক।

questions.question: Shahzain had already ____ (swim) five laps when I jumped into the pool.
questions.explanation: The correct past participle to fill in the blank is swum : "Shahzain had already swum five laps when I jumped into the pool." Here's why: "Swim" is the base verb and wouldn't work in this context because it's the present tense. "Swum" is the past participle of "swim" and is used with the auxiliary verb "had" to form the past perfect tense, indicating an action completed before another past action (jumping into the pool). "Swimmed" is another past tense form of "swim," but it wouldn't fit correctly here because the sentence requires the past perfect tense to show that Shahzain's swimming happened before your jump. "Swimming" is the present participle and wouldn't fit the grammatically needed past perfect tense form. Therefore, "swum" is the most accurate and grammatically correct choice to convey that Shahzain had completed five laps before you joined the pool.

questions.question: প্রমথ চোধুরীর "সাহিত্যে খেলা" প্রবন্ধটি সর্ব প্রথম কোন পত্রিকায় প্রকাশিত হয়?
নিচের কোন লেখক 'কাঁঠালপাড়ায়' জন্ম গ্রহণ করেন?
questions.explanation: হুমায়ুন আহমেদ-নেত্রকোনার কুতুবপুর ১৯৪৮ সালে জন্ম প্রমথ চৌধুরী- যশোর জেলায় ১৮০৪ সালে জহির রায়হান- ফেনির মজুপুর গ্রামে ১৯৩৫ সালে বঙ্কিমচন্দ্র - কাঁঠালপাড়া গ্রাম চব্বিশ পরগণা ১৮৩৮ সালে।

questions.question: 'দেবী চোধুরাণী' কার উপন্যাস?
questions.explanation: প্রকাশের মাধ্যমে তাঁর সাহিত্যচর্চার শুরু। বঙ্কিমচন্দ্রের গ্রন্থসংখ্যা ৩৪ । তাঁর রচিত প্রথম উপন্যাস ‘দুর্গেশনন্দিনী' । তাঁর অন্যান্য উল্লেখযোগ্য উপন্যাস হলো : 'কপালকুণ্ডলা', ‘মৃণালিনী’, ‘বিষবৃক্ষ', ‘কৃষ্ণকান্তের উইল', ‘চন্দ্রশেখর’, ‘আনন্দমঠ’, ‘দেবী চৌধুরাণী', ‘রাজসিংহ’, ‘সীতারাম’। ‘Rajmohons Wife' নামে একটি ইংরেজি উপন্যাসও তিনি রচনা করেছেন।

questions.question: আমি বক্তা নহি। আমি কমবক্তার দলে- এই অংশটি কোন গদ্যের অন্তর্গত?

questions.question: খোদা' শব্দটি কোন ভাষার শব্দ?
questions.explanation: খােদা' ফারসি ভাষার শব্দ। ফারসি ভাষার আরাে কয়েকটি শব্দ ; নামাজ, রােজা, দোজখ, ফেরেশতা, বেহেশত, দফতর, তারিখ, নালিশ, নমুনা, হাঙ্গামা, রফতানি।

questions.question: যে ভবিষ্যৎ না ভেবে কাজ করে' এর সঠিক এক কথায় প্রকাশ কোনটি?
questions.explanation: এককথায় প্রকাশ যে বিষয়ে কোনো বিতর্ক নেই-অবিসংবাদী। যা অতি দীর্ঘ নয়-নাতিদীর্ঘ। যা বলার যোগ্য নয়-অকথ্য। যার সর্বস্ব হারিয়ে গেছে-সর্বহারা, হৃতসর্বস্ব।

questions.question: নিচের কোনটি 'অলুক তৎপুরুষ সমাসের উদাহরণ?
questions.explanation: যে তৎপুরুষ সমাসের পূর্বপদের দ্বিতীয়াদি বিভক্তি লোপ পায়না তাকে অলুক তৎপুরুষ সমাস বলে। যেমন- মনের মানুষ, মাটির মানুষ, হাতের পাঁচ ,কলের গান, গরুর গাড়ি ইত্যাদি।

questions.question: নিচের কোনটি 'পর্বত' শব্দের সমার্থক নয়?
questions.explanation: পর্বত শব্দের সমার্থক শব্দ হলো - অদ্রি, গিরি, পাহাড়, ভূধর, শৈল, নাগ, মহীধর, ক্ষিতিধর । মহী শব্দের অর্থ পৃথিবী

questions.option_a: General Agreement on Tariffs and trade
questions.option_b: General Agreement on Trade and Tariffs
questions.option_c: General Agreement on Tax and Tarifs
questions.option_d: General Agreement on Tariffs and Tax
questions.explanation: The General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT), signed in 1947 by 23 countries, is a treaty minimizing barriers to international trade by eliminating or reducing quotas, tariffs , and subsidies. It was intended to boost economic recovery after World War II.

questions.tag: RU-F 17-18: Set-1,RU B 22-23 (অ-বাণিজ্য),RU C 17-18 (অ-বিজ্ঞান),JU B 22-23 Set-I,JU B 10-11: Set-02,JU E 16-17 Set-2
questions.question: নিচের কোনটি জাতিসংঘ সম্পর্কিত নয়?
questions.explanation: নিম্নোক্ত সংস্থা গুলোর মধ্যে ASEAN ছাড়া সবগুলোই জাতিসংঘের অঙ্গ সংগঠন। ASEAN (১৯৬৭) হ দক্ষিন-পূর্ব এশিয়ার আঞ্চলিক সহযোগিতামূলক সংগঠন যার সদর দপ্তর ইন্দোনেশিয়ার জাকার্তায় অবস্থিত ।ASEAN (দক্ষিণ পূর্ব এশীয় রাষ্ট্রগুলির সংগঠন) জাতিসংঘের অন্তর্ভুক্ত নয়। এটি একটি আঞ্চলিক সংগঠন যা দক্ষিণ পূর্ব এশিয়ার দেশগুলিকে একত্রিত করে। অন্য তিনটি প্রতিষ্ঠান, যেমন ILO (আন্তর্জাতিক কর্মসংস্থান সংস্থা), WHO (বিশ্ব স্বাস্থ্য সংস্থা), এবং WNFPA (জনসংখ্যা তহবিল) জাতিসংঘের সাথে সম্পর্কিত। Context: ASEAN জাতিসংঘের অন্তর্ভুক্ত নয়। ILO, WHO, এবং WNFPA জাতিসংঘের অংশ।

questions.explanation: বাংলাদেশের পাঁচ টাকার নোট অর্থ মন্ত্রণালয় কর্তৃক ইস্যু করা হয়।

Price of a product is denoted by p. If pric 9=e is decreased by 20% and increased one month late by 60% of existing price, what is the new price expressed in terms of p ?
If a+b+c=15 and a²+b²+c²=83, what is the value of ab+bc+ca?
questions.explanation: Given that, a + b + c = 15 a+b+c=15 a + b + c = 15 and a 2 + b 2 + c 2 = 83 a^{2}+b^{2}+c^{2}=83 a 2 + b 2 + c 2 = 83 We know, 2 ( a b + b c + c a ) = ( a + b + c ) 2 − ( a 2 + b 2 + c 2 ) ⇒ 2 ( a b + b c + c a ) = ( 15 ) 2 − 83 ⇒ 2 ( a b + b c + c a ) = 225 − 83 ⇒ a b + b c + c a = 142 2 ⇒ a b + b c + c a = 71 \begin{array}{l} 2(a b+b c+c a)=(a+b+c)^{2}-\left(a^{2}+b^{2}+c^{2}\right) \\ \Rightarrow 2(a b+b c+c a)=(15)^{2}-83 \\ \Rightarrow 2(a b+b c+c a)=225-83 \\ \Rightarrow a b+b c+c a=\frac{142}{2} \Rightarrow a b+b c+c a=71 \end{array} 2 ( ab + b c + c a ) = ( a + b + c ) 2 − ( a 2 + b 2 + c 2 ) ⇒ 2 ( ab + b c + c a ) = ( 15 ) 2 − 83 ⇒ 2 ( ab + b c + c a ) = 225 − 83 ⇒ ab + b c + c a = 2 142 ​ ⇒ ab + b c + c a = 71 ​

If >t, r>q, s>t, and t>r. which of the following must be true? i. u > s ii. s > q iii. s > r
questions.explanation: i. u>s is not possible, because if, u=5, s=6, t=2 then u>t=5,s>t=6>2 both are right. but u>6=5<6. so,acoriding to question to question u>s, ii. s>q,q is the least possible value in this equation. som s>q is true iii. u>r, according to question u>t and t>r, then the equation are, u>r is true i) u > s u>s u > s is not possible. because if, u = 5 , s = 6 , t = 2 \mathrm{u}=5, \mathrm{~s}=6, \mathrm{t}=2 u = 5 , s = 6 , t = 2 thien u > t = 5 > 2 , s > t = 6 > 2 \mathrm{u}>\mathrm{t}=5>2, \mathrm{~s}>\mathrm{t}=6>2 u > t = 5 > 2 , s > t = 6 > 2 both are right. but u < s = 5 < 6 \mathrm{u}<\mathrm{s}=5<6 u < s = 5 < 6 . So, according to question u > s \mathrm{u}>\mathrm{s} u > s , which is not possible ii) s > q , q s>\mathrm{q}, \mathrm{q} s > q , q is the least possible value in this equation. So, s > q s>q s > q is true iii) u > r \mathrm{u}>\mathrm{r} u > r , According to question u > t \mathrm{u}>\mathrm{t} u > t and t > r \mathrm{t}>\mathrm{r} t > r , then the equation are, u > t > r \mathrm{u}>\mathrm{t}>\mathrm{r} u > t > r so, u > r \mathrm{u}>\mathrm{r} u > r is true

questions.question: B can work thrice as much as A can do in day. If they together can do 4/15 parts of a work in 10 days, in how many days will B finish the woek alone?
questions.explanation: Let, A = 1 3 B ⇒ A = B 3 A=\frac{1}{3} B \Rightarrow A=\frac{B}{3} A = 3 1 ​ B ⇒ A = 3 B ​ According to question. ( A + B ) 10 = 4 15 ⇒ ( B 3 + B ) 10 = 4 15 ⇒ B = 4 × 3 15 × 10 × 4 ⇒ B = 1 50 \begin{array}{l} (A+B) 10=\frac{4}{15} \Rightarrow\left(\frac{B}{3}+B\right) 10=\frac{4}{15} \\ \Rightarrow B=\frac{4 \times 3}{15 \times 10 \times 4} \Rightarrow B=\frac{1}{50} \end{array} ( A + B ) 10 = 15 4 ​ ⇒ ( 3 B ​ + B ) 10 = 15 4 ​ ⇒ B = 15 × 10 × 4 4 × 3 ​ ⇒ B = 50 1 ​ ​ do, 1 50 \frac{1}{50} 50 1 ​ part work in 1 days 1 part work in 50 × 1 50 \times 1 50 × 1 days = 50 =50 = 50 days

questions.question: Think of a number and then double the number. Add 6 and multiply the result by 10. Now divide the result by 20, then subtract the numbet you first though out, what is the result?
questions.explanation: Let the number = 1 =1 = 1 Double the number = 2 =2 = 2 Add 6 = 2 + 6 = 8 6=2+6=8 6 = 2 + 6 = 8 Multiple 10 = 8 × 10 = 80 10=8 \times 10=80 10 = 8 × 10 = 80 Divided by 20 = 80 20 = 4 20=\frac{80}{20}=4 20 = 20 80 ​ = 4 Subtract number from first though number is = ( 4 − 1 ) = 3 =(4-1)=3 = ( 4 − 1 ) = 3

The average temperature on Mondau. Tiesdau. & Wednesday was 84⁰ and for Tuseday, Wednesday and Thusday 87⁰. IF temperature on Monday was 91⁰, find the temperature on Thursday?
questions.explanation: Monday+Tuesday+Wednesday=84⁰✕3=252⁰ Tuesday+wednesday+Thursday=87⁰✕3=261⁰ so, Thursday-Monday=261⁰-252⁰ Thursday= 90⁰+91⁰=100⁰

If the ratio of men to women in a class is 3:5 and the class contains 24 people, how many additional men would have enroll to make the ratio of men to women 1:1?
questions.explanation: Solve: M : W = 3 : 5 \mathrm{M}: \mathrm{W}=3: 5 M : W = 3 : 5 = 3 × 3 : 5 × 3 =3 \times 3: 5 \times 3 = 3 × 3 : 5 × 3 [multiple by 3 ] = 9 : 15 ∴ =9: 15 \quad \therefore = 9 : 15 ∴ Additional men = 15 − 9 = 6 =15-9=6 = 15 − 9 = 6

questions.question: Mahumud ate 1/4 of a whole pizza, and Debu ate 1/5 the remaining portion. What fraction of the pizza was not eaten?
questions.explanation: Solve: Let whole pizza = 100 % =100 \% = 100% Mahmud ate = 1 4 = 25 % =\frac{1}{4}=25 \% = 4 1 ​ = 25% Remaining portion = 75 % =75 \% = 75% Debu ate = 75 × 1 5 = 15 % =75 \times \frac{1}{5}=15 \% = 75 × 5 1 ​ = 15% Remaining portion = 60 % =60 \% = 60% ∴ \therefore ∴ Fraction of pizza was not eaten = 60 % = 60 100 = 3 5 =60 \%=\frac{60}{100}=\frac{3}{5} = 60% = 100 60 ​ = 5 3 ​

questions.question: Himel has a goal to bench press 220 pounds. When he started working out, Himel was able to lift 150 pounds. He currently increased that amount by20%. Ehat percent of his current lifting amount must he increase to reach his of 220 pounds?
16% of a s equals t. 10% of t equals 40. What is the value of s-t?
questions.explanation: Solve: 10 % 10 \% 10% of t = 40 \mathrm{t}=40 t = 40 ⇒ 10 100 × t = 40 ⇒ t = 40 × 100 10 ⇒ t = 400 \begin{array}{l} \Rightarrow \frac{10}{100} \times t=40 \\ \Rightarrow t=\frac{40 \times 100}{10} \\ \Rightarrow t=400 \end{array} ⇒ 100 10 ​ × t = 40 ⇒ t = 10 40 × 100 ​ ⇒ t = 400 ​ 16 % of s = t ⇒ 16 100 × s = 400 ⇒ s = 400 × 100 16 ⇒ s = 2500 \begin{array}{l}16 \% \text { of } s=t \\ \Rightarrow \frac{16}{100} \times s=400 \\ \Rightarrow s=\frac{400 \times 100}{16} \\ \Rightarrow s=2500\end{array} 16% of s = t ⇒ 100 16 ​ × s = 400 ⇒ s = 16 400 × 100 ​ ⇒ s = 2500 ​ ∴ s − t = 2500 − 400 = 2100 \therefore s-t=2500-400=2100 ∴ s − t = 2500 − 400 = 2100

questions.question: Observe the following informatin and find the correct answer? i. logₐ(m)ᵖ=plogₐm ii. 2⁴=16and log² 16= 4are synonymous iii. logₐ(m+n)=logₐ m+logₐn
questions.explanation: Solve: i) log ⁡ a ( m ) p = p log ⁡ a m \log _{a}{ }^{(m) p}=p \log _{a}{ }^{m} lo g a ​ ( m ) p = p lo g a ​ m ii) 2 4 = 16 = 2 4 2^{4}=16=2^{4} 2 4 = 16 = 2 4 and log ⁡ 2 16 = log ⁡ 2 2 4 = 4 log ⁡ 2 2 = 4 \log _{2}{ }^{16}=\log _{2} 2^{4}=4 \log _{2}{ }^{2}=4 lo g 2 ​ 16 = lo g 2 ​ 2 4 = 4 lo g 2 ​ 2 = 4 iii) log ⁡ a ( m + n ) ≠ log ⁡ a m + log ⁡ a n \log _{a}{ }^{(m+n)} \neq \log _{a}{ }^{m}+\log _{a}{ }^{n} lo g a ​ ( m + n )  = lo g a ​ m + lo g a ​ n

questions.question: There are 30 students in class. Among them, 8 students are learning both English and French. A total of 18 student learning English.If every student is learning at least one language, how many students are learnign French in total?
questions.explanation: Solve: Total = English + French − both ⇒ 30 = 18 + French − 8 ⇒ 30 − 10 = French ⇒ 20 = French \begin{array}{l}\text { Solve: } \text { Total }=\text { English }+ \text { French }- \text { both } \\ \quad \Rightarrow 30=18+\text { French }-8 \\ \Rightarrow 30-10=\text { French } \Rightarrow 20=\text { French }\end{array} Solve: Total = English + French − both ⇒ 30 = 18 + French − 8 ⇒ 30 − 10 = French ⇒ 20 = French ​
